Name: UNICEF
Description: Works to ensure every child can access quality education.

Name: Room to Read
Description: Focuses on literacy and gender equality in education.

Name: Save the Children
Description: Provides educational resources to children in need.

Name: Teach For All
Description: Network of organizations aiming to expand educational opportunity.

Name: Khan Academy
Description: Provides free online educational content to learners worldwide.

Name: Scholarship America
Description: Helps students achieve their dreams of higher education.

Name: The Education Trust
Description: Advocates for the high academic achievement of all students.

Name: The Global Fund for Children
Description: Invests in innovative, community-based organizations helping children worldwide.

Name: Pencils of Promise
Description: Builds schools and increases educational opportunities in developing countries.

Name: The Luminos Fund
Description: Delivers a joyful, primary education to children denied the chance to learn.

Name: Doctors Without Borders
Description: Provides medical aid in crisis situations around the world.

Name: American Cancer Society
Description: Dedicated to eliminating cancer as a major health problem.

Name: The Red Cross
Description: Offers emergency assistance, disaster relief, and education worldwide.

Name: St. Jude Children's Research Hospital
Description: Leading the way the world understands, treats, and defeats childhood cancer.

Name: The Alzheimer's Association
Description: Leads the way to end Alzheimer's and all other dementia.

Name: Project HOPE
Description: Provides healthcare and health education globally.

Name: Partners In Health
Description: Provides healthcare to the poor and marginalized communities.

Name: Mental Health America
Description: Promotes mental health as a critical part of overall wellness.

Name: The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society
Description: The largest voluntary health organization dedicated to blood cancer.

Name: Operation Smile
Description: Provides free surgeries to repair cleft lip, cleft palate, and other facial deformities for children around the globe.

Name: World Wildlife Fund
Description: Works to conserve nature and reduce the most pressing threats to the diversity of life on Earth.

Name: Greenpeace
Description: Campaigns for environmental issues and against climate change.

Name: The Sierra Club
Description: Promotes the responsible use of the earth's ecosystems and resources.

Name: The Nature Conservancy
Description: Works to protect the lands and waters on which all life depends.

Name: Rainforest Alliance
Description: Works to conserve biodiversity and ensure sustainable livelihoods.

Name: Friends of the Earth
Description: A network that campaigns for environmental justice.

Name: Ocean Conservancy
Description: Works to protect the ocean from today's greatest global challenges.

Name: Earthjustice
Description: A nonprofit environmental law organization fighting for the protection of the environment.

Name: Environmental Defense Fund
Description: Addresses urgent threats to life on Earth, like climate change.

Name: 350.org
Description: Works to end the age of fossil fuels and build a world of community-led renewable energy for all.

Name: The Humane Society of the United States
Description: Fights for the protection of all animals.

Name: ASPCA
Description: Works to rescue animals from abuse and pass humane laws.

Name: PETA
Description: Dedicated to establishing and defending the rights of all animals.

Name: Best Friends Animal Society
Description: Works to save them all by building no-kill communities.

Name: Wildlife Conservation Society
Description: Works to save wildlife and wild places worldwide.

Name: World Animal Protection
Description: Works to end the suffering of animals worldwide.

Name: Animal Welfare Institute
Description: Seeks to alleviate the suffering of animals caused by humans.

Name: International Fund for Animal Welfare
Description: Works to rescue and protect animals around the world.

Name: Humane Society International
Description: Works to protect all animals around the world.

Name: Animal Legal Defense Fund
Description: Works to protect the lives and advance the interests of animals through the legal system.

Name: Habitat for Humanity
Description: Helps build and improve homes for families in need.

Name: Heifer International
Description: Works to end hunger and poverty by providing livestock and training.

Name: Oxfam
Description: Works to end the injustice of poverty.

Name: CARE
Description: Fights global poverty and provides disaster relief.

Name: United Way
Description: Fights for the health, education, and financial stability of every person in every community.

Name: The Salvation Army
Description: Provides a wide array of social services worldwide.

Name: Mercy Corps
Description: Helps people in the world's toughest places survive the crises they confront and turn them into opportunities for progress.

Name: GlobalGiving
Description: Connects donors with grassroots projects around the world.

Name: World Vision
Description: Helps the world's most vulnerable overcome poverty and experience fullness of life.

Name: Build Change
Description: Works to save lives in earthquakes and windstorms by empowering people to live and learn in safe houses.
